meanings.definition: A set of tools or equipment for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: My dad bought a new kit to fix the broken chair.
meanings.sent2: She received a sewing kit for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The kit of paintbrushes danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: His words were his kit for building relationships.
meanings.sent5: The kit gleamed in the sunlight, ready for use.

meanings.definition: A collection of items sold or distributed together.
meanings.sent1: The camping kit included a tent, sleeping bag, and stove.
meanings.sent2: The first aid kit was always kept in the car for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The kit of snacks disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the perfect kit for brightening up a room.
meanings.sent5: The survival kit contained everything needed for the wilderness.

meanings.sent1: The playful kit chased after its siblings in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The mother fox kept a watchful eye on her kit.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kit got into trouble again.
meanings.sent4: The golden fur of the kit shone in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The kit's curiosity led it on an adventure through the forest.
